key_members.name: Gian Marco
key_members.background: Technical lead with experience at Nasdaq, Ethereum Foundation (account abstraction), and Ubisoft (NFT gaming)

key_members.name: Boris Mamlyuk
key_members.background: CEO and general counsel with crypto law expertise and former law professor

team_details.expertise: Strong technical and legal background; positive feedback from Impossible Finance research committee

core_tech: Universal matching engine for cross-chain liquidity

market_analysis.competitive_advantage: Early MetaMask integration, AI-driven transactions, and strategic partnerships
market_analysis.market_opportunity: Growing demand for cross-chain infrastructure in DeFi V2

revenue_streams: Pilot app revenue (CleanApp, Vamp.Fun) starting July 2025

gaps: Dependence on user lock-in for adoption

key_risks: Execution risk due to reliance on partnerships
Token adoption uncertainty without clear utility

recommendation: Strong team and partnerships with high growth potential, but requires clarification on tokenomics and revenue projections. Caution advised due to regulatory and adoption risks.
